item.title: Ring of Construct Control
item.fluff: This old, heavy iron band is free of rust and bears tiny etchings of machine parts

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against constructs.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: HitThe target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
CritDominated (save ends) or until the end of your next turn, whichever lasts longer.

item.title: Ring of Dragons
item.fluff: This simple brass ring looks like a dragon circling to bite its own tail

block.name: Properties
block.line: The ring has the following properties:
You can speak, read, and write Draconic.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectEvil dragons within a a day's travel know the direction and distance to the ring for 24 hours.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou create an illusion of a dragon up to Gargantual size in an unoccupied space within 40 squares of you. The illusion lasts until the end of your next turn, until an attack hits it, or until a creature touches it or enters its space.
The illusion can make sounds and can move within its space, and each of its defenses is 14. An Insight check with a Hard DC of your level allows a creature to determine that the image is an illusion.
Sustain MinorThe illusion persists until the end of your next turn, and you can move it up to 10 squares.
